title: An Interface to IMF (International Monetary Fund) Data JSON API
An Interface to IMF (International Monetary Fund) Data JSON API
code: library(imf.data)  # list all available time-series list_datasets() #>               ID                                                        Description #> 297       AFRREO              Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) #> 41  AFRREO201410 Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) October 2014 #> 110 AFRREO201504   Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) April 2015 #> 58  AFRREO201510 Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) October 2015 #> 78  AFRREO201604   Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) April 2016 #> 21  AFRREO201610 Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) October 2016 #> 34  AFRREO201704   Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) April 2017 #>  [ reached 'max' / getOption("max.print") -- omitted 316 rows ] # load IFS time-series IFS <- load_datasets("IFS")  # see possible values for dimension 'ref_area' IFS$dimensions$ref_area #>   Value         Description #> 1    AF         Afghanistan #> 2    AL             Albania #> 3    DZ             Algeria #> 4    AD             Andorra #> 5    AO              Angola #> 6    AI            Anguilla #> 7    AG Antigua and Barbuda #>  [ reached 'max' / getOption("max.print") -- omitted 271 rows ]  # get time-series for GDP of Portugal, with Annual frequency IFS$get_series(freq = "A", ref_area = "PT", indicator = "NGDP_D_IX") #>   TIME_PERIOD   A.PT.NGDP_D_IX #> 1        1995  65.121159550493 #> 2        1996 66.6781968283958 #> 3        1997 69.2687835398304 #> 4        1998 71.9183372769496 #> 5        1999 74.3423648876999 #> 6        2000 76.8850736800294 #> 7        2001 79.7421096759417 #>  [ reached 'max' / getOption("max.print") -- omitted 21 rows ] # load DOT time-series DOT <- load_datasets("DOT")  DOT$get_series(freq = "M",                ref_area = "PT",                indicator = "TMG_CIF_USD",                counterpart_area = c("B0","W00"),                start_period = "2022-01-01",                end_period = "2022-12-31") #>   TIME_PERIOD M.PT.TMG_CIF_USD.B0 M.PT.TMG_CIF_USD.W00 #> 1     2022-01         5899.209507          8592.410482 #> 2     2022-02         6625.214152          9306.561169 #> 3     2022-03         7271.456185         10056.201211 #> 4     2022-04         6639.368158          9427.777556 #> 5     2022-05         7095.966482         10432.681421 #>  [ reached 'max' / getOption("max.print") -- omitted 7 rows ] HPDD <- load_datasets("HPDD")  HPDD$dimensions$indicator #>        Value       Description #> 1 GGXWDG_GDP Debt to GDP Ratio  HPDD$get_series(freq = "A",                 ref_area = c("PT","ES"),                 indicator = "GGXWDG_GDP",                  start_period = "1974") #>   TIME_PERIOD  A.PT.GGXWDG_GDP  A.ES.GGXWDG_GDP #> 1        1974 13.5038251401281 8.40504508036064 #> 2        1975 19.1667501320296 7.25030408773679 #> 3        1976 24.5259382117236 13.0038706110036 #> 4        1977 26.8756607793361 15.3279581608194 #> 5        1978 29.8913266186709 14.3281987356424 #>  [ reached 'max' / getOption("max.print") -- omitted 37 rows ]

what: imf.data: An Interface to IMF (International Monetary Fund) Data JSON API — imf.data-package
title: imf.data: An Interface to IMF (International Monetary Fund) Data JSON API — imf.data-package
text: straightforward interface accessing IMF (International Monetary Fund) data JSON API, available https://data.imf.org/. package offers direct access primary API endpoints: Dataflow, DataStructure, CompactData. , provides intuitive interface exploring available dimensions attributes, well querying individual time-series datasets. Additionally, package implements rate limit API calls reduce chances exceeding service limits (limited 10 calls every 5 seconds) encountering response errors.

title: imf.data: An Interface to IMF (International Monetary Fund) Data JSON API — imf.data-package

code: d <- list_datasets() head(d) #>             ID #> 1       AFRREO #> 2 AFRREO201410 #> 3 AFRREO201504 #> 4 AFRREO201510 #> 5 AFRREO201604 #> 6 AFRREO201610 #>                                                          Description #> 1              Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) #> 2 Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) October 2014 #> 3   Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) April 2015 #> 4 Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) October 2015 #> 5   Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) April 2016 #> 6 Sub-Saharan Africa Regional Economic Outlook (AFRREO) October 2016

title: Loads Time Series Datasets — load_datasets
text: id character vector Dataset Series identifier. use_cache Boolean, defaults TRUE, TRUE reloads Dataset cached values.

title: Loads Time Series Datasets — load_datasets
text: dataset object time-series identifier, .e. list containing list 'dimensions' data.frames valid dimensions values, function 'get_series' retrieve time-series data.

what: Calls API endpoint 'CompactData' to get Dataset time series — mt_compact_data
title: Calls API endpoint 'CompactData' to get Dataset time series — mt_compact_data
text: Calls API endpoint 'CompactData' get Dataset time series

title: Calls API endpoint 'CompactData' to get Dataset time series — mt_compact_data
code: mt_compact_data(id, dimensions, start_period = NA, end_period = NA)

title: Calls API endpoint 'CompactData' to get Dataset time series — mt_compact_data
text: id Dataset Series identifier. dimensions named list dimensions query. start_period time series start date formats. end_period time series end date format. See Details valid formats.
